findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: BLS data shows 4.1% unemployment in December 2024, not 3.5%. Source: bls.gov/news.release/empsit.nr0.htm

findings.quote: 6.3% peak during the pandemic in April 2020
findings.issue: April 2020 unemployment was 14.7%, not 6.3% - more than double the claimed figure. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2020/unemployment-rate-rises-to-record-high-14-point-7-percent-in-april-2020.htm

findings.quote: Federal Reserve's current federal funds rate is 5.25-5.50%
findings.issue: Fed funds rate was cut to 4.25-4.50% by December 2024. Source: Federal Reserve data

findings.quote: Inflation, as measured by the Consumer Price Index, was 3.1% year-over-year in November 2024
findings.issue: November 2024 CPI was 2.7% year-over-year, not 3.1%. Source: BLS/CNBC reports

findings.quote: Oil prices (WTI crude) averaged $78 per barrel in November 2024
findings.issue: WTI crude averaged $69.95 per barrel in November 2024, not $78. Source: Statista/EIA data

findings.quote: Congressional Budget Office's 2024 economic outlook, GDP growth is projected at 2.1% for 2025
findings.issue: CBO projects 1.9% GDP growth for 2025, not 2.1%. Source: cbo.gov/publication/61172

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: factual_verification
Severity: major
Line: 15
Quote: "A recent Stanford study found that remote work increases productivity by 13% compared to in-office work"
Issue: Cannot verify 2023 American Economic Review publication; recent Stanford research shows fully remote work REDUCES productivity by 10-20%
[/FINDING]

parsed.quote: A recent Stanford study found that remote work increases productivity by 13% compared to in-office work
parsed.issue: Cannot verify 2023 American Economic Review publication; recent Stanford research shows fully remote work REDUCES productivity by 10-20%
